thumb.title: Mastering the art of speech guest Richard Blank Costa Ricas Call Center.
thumb.description: Building a Human-Centered Call Center: Lessons from Richard Blank on Bridging Success Podcast with Bo JakinsIn this episode of Bridging Success, Bo Jakins interviews the President and Bilingual Telemarketing Trainer of Costa Rica's Call Center, Richard Blank. Richard shares his journey of building a call center in Costa Rica, highlighting the importance of human connection, positive workplace culture, and adapting to technological change.https://youtu.be/_PtlIRMNkqMhttps://youtu.be/1AwjW059FNMhttps://youtu.be/Ah7TlQfJFg0https://youtu.be/vnoyymY5TWQhttps://youtube.com/shorts/CAqgwzCgKPghttps://youtu.be/SJJoyy-pW24https://youtu.be/QPqMcZ0e5kohttps://youtu.be/vHm6XWvuQgUhttps://youtu.be/bYsYk1nF3Do
